items.question: Is Ant Card free to use?
items.answer: Ant Card is currently free, meeting basic resume creation needs. The open-source version's features will remain unchanged, and the PDF export feature will always be free.

items.question: Is my resume data secure?
items.answer: Yes, very secure. Ant Card uses local storage, meaning all your data is stored on your own device with no cloud storage, ensuring complete privacy protection.

items.question: What export formats are supported?
items.answer: We currently support PDF export, ensuring your resume maintains consistent formatting on any device. We plan to support more export formats in the future.

items.question: How can I sync across devices?
items.answer: We provide JSON configuration export, allowing you to save your resume settings in JSON format, accessible anytime, anywhere, on any device.

items.question: How customizable is it?
items.answer: We offer rich customization options, including colors, layouts, and more, allowing you to adjust your resume style according to personal preferences and industry requirements.

about.title: About
about.description: Ant Card is a professional personal card creation tool dedicated to providing users with an easy-to-use and powerful card design experience. We believe everyone should have a beautiful personal showcase card, whether for business occasions or personal branding. Through intelligent design systems and rich template libraries, card creation becomes simple and fun.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Have questions about Ant Card? Find answers below or [contact us](mailto:support@antcard.com)

questions.question: What formats does Ant Card support for Md2Card creation?
questions.answer: Ant Card supports Markdown, Md2Card format, and plain text input. You can also export your Md2Cards to PNG, JPEG, SVG, and PDF formats. Our Markdown card generator handles all popular formats.
questions.relatedLinks: Learn more about our [Md2Card format support](#md2card-support)

questions.question: Can I create multiple Md2Cards at once with Ant Card?
questions.answer: Yes! Ant Card's batch creation feature allows you to generate multiple Md2Cards simultaneously. This card creation tool can process dozens of cards in minutes, perfect for bulk content creation.

questions.question: How does Ant Card's Markdown to Md2Card conversion work?
questions.answer: Ant Card uses advanced rendering technology to convert your Markdown text into beautiful Md2Cards instantly. Our card creation tool maintains perfect formatting and visual appeal throughout the conversion process.

questions.question: Is Ant Card the best Markdown card generator for social media?
questions.answer: Ant Card is specifically optimized for social media content creation. Our Markdown card generator provides platform-ready sizes, smart text splitting, and batch export features that make it ideal for social media managers and content creators.

questions.question: Can I customize Md2Card templates in Ant Card?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Ant Card offers extensive customization options for your Md2Cards including colors, fonts, layouts, and more. Our card creation tool makes it easy to match your brand while maintaining professional quality.
